mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, D.RECEIVER_PHONE, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS FROM ORDER_TB O JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID JOIN DELIVERY_ADDRESS D ON D.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID

SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_IMPNO, O.RECEIVER_NAME, O.RECEIVER_PHONE, O.REQUEST_MSG, O.DELIVERY_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_ID, D.ADDRESS_NAME, D.ADDRESS_OTHER FROM ORDER_TB O JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID JOIN DELIVERY_ADDRESS D ON D.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID WHERE O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_CHANGE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRODUCT_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CART C ON C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO JOIN ORDER_TB O ON O.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID WHERE ORDER_NO=#{orderNo}

SELECT O.ORDER_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME, PD.PRODUCT_NAME, PD.PRODUCT_PRICE, PD.PRODUCT_NO, P.CANCEL_STATUS, M.MEMBER_ID FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDER_TB O ON O.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN PRODUCT PD ON PD.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT O.ORDER_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME, PD.PRODUCT_NAME, PD.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.CANCEL_STATUS FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDER_TB O ON O.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN PRODUCT PD ON PD.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{memberName} || '%' ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC
SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, D.ADDRESS_OTHER FROM MEMBER M JOIN DELIVERY_ADDRESS D ON D.MEMBER_ID= M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT O.ORDER_IMPNO, PD.PRODUCT_NAME, PD.PRODUCT_PRICE, O.ORDER_DATE, O.CANCEL_DATE, P.CANCEL_REASON, P.CANCEL_STATUS FROM ORDER_TB O JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.ORDER_IMPNO = O.ORDER_IMPNO JOIN PRODUCT PD ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PD.PRODUCT_NO WHERE O.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TB O JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID JOIN DELIVERY_ADDRESS D ON D.MEMBER_ID = O.MEMBER_ID
